Taxon name.Name: Curvularia spicifera
Taxon name.Synonymy:
Current name: Bipolaris spicifera (Bainier) Subramanian 1971 MB#309557 
Basionym: Brachycladium spiciferum Bainier 1908 MB#221562 
Obligate synonyms: 
   - Curvularia spicifera (Bainier) Boedijn 1909 MB#278597 
   - Drechslera spicifera (Bainier) Arx 1970 MB#313402 
   - Helminthosporium spiciferum (Bainier) Nicot 1953 MB#298294 
   - Brachysporium spiciferum (Bainier) Corbetta 1963 MB#327190 
   - Dendryphion spiciferum (Bainier) Saccardo & Traverso 1910 MB#192114 
Taxonomic synonyms: 
   - Helminthosporium tetramera McKinney 1925 MB#255085 
         - Drechslera tetramera (McKinney) Subramanian & B.L. Jain 1966 MB#330220 
         - Bipolaris tetramera (McKinney) Shoemaker 1925 MB#293703 
         - Curvularia tetramera (McKinney) Boedijn ex J.C. Gilman 1945 MB#296258 
   - Helminthosporium tetramerum McKinney 1925 MB#587539

Restrictions on use: for commercial development a special agreement is requested
Nagoya protocol restrictions and complia: no known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol
